channel.title: Longer samples import feature one day?
channel.description: Will we ever be able to import samples/ audio files longer than 20 seconds in the future, cause i’d like to import vocal recordings but who knows. Just a a thought.

item.title: Longer samples import feature one day?
item.dc:creator: JacobJustus
item.description:
IKR! I’ve been nerding out about this all year long!

Read full topic
item.source: Longer samples import feature one day?

item.title: Longer samples import feature one day?
item.dc:creator: Danbligity
item.description:
Agreed! A unique ecosystem with strong value features, that if used the ways intended, make Auxy a workhorse DAW disguised as a phone app. …and for those that haven’t thought ahead to the upcoming MASSIVE 5G Revolution that will change the World, pretty much Overnight!..I’d be shocked if the Auxy minds weren’t well into the concept designs for a Wicki Dope platform upgrade, that is way more intuitive as well as perhaps some VR features Then combine Blockchain ledger to the mix & WOW! Extremely exciting times ahead in regards to IoT!!

Read full topic
